Will you be a courageous fighter, charging headfirst into battle, or a sly rogue, moving quietly to strike at foes from the shadows? Maybe you will be a knowledgeable wizard, wielding incredible arcane spells or a wise and pious cleric, using the power of your deity to shape the world for the better. It is all up to you!

Inside you will find a rich toolbox, filled with everything you need to get started, including rules for character generation, an introductory adventure, guidelines to build your own campaign, character sheets, a full-color map, character pawns, and dice. This deluxe box set is the ideal introduction to the Pathfinder Roleplaying Game, leading the way to a lifetime of adventure!

The Pathfinder Beginner Box includes:

•An 80-page Hero's Handbook, including rules for character generation, a solo adventure, skills, spells, and equipment.

  • A 96-page Game Master's Handbook, containing an introductory adventure, over 20 pages of monsters, rules for building your own adventure, and magic items.
  • Four premade characters so you can jump right into the action and four blank character sheets if you want to make your own hero.
  • Over 100 character and monster pawns to use on the full-color double-sided adventure map.
  • Four game reference cards to help players remember their actions.

    Note: This version of the Beginner Box includes content updates to bring it up-to-date with the Pathfinder Second Edition Remaster Project. Purchase of the PDF version will include both the legacy (OGL) and Remaster (ORC) versions.

developers.developer-name: Jason Bulmahn, Mark Seifter, Lyz Liddell and Logan Bonner

pathfinderflip-mat_rusthengepdfandjpg.description_text:
Bring your adventures near the town of Iron Harbor to life on your tabletop with this double-sided full-color Flip-Mat featuring two key encounter locations from the new introductory Pathfinder Second Edition adventure Rusthenge on either side! One side depicts a twisting coastline, while the other side shows the mysterious ruins of Rusthenge itself! Don't waste your time sketching when you could be playing. With Pathfinder Flip-Mat: Rusthenge, you'll be ready to introduce Pathfinder in style!

Pathfinder Flip-Mat: Rusthenge measures 24"" x 30"" unfolded, and 8"" x 10"" folded. A Flip-Mat's coated surface can handle any dry erase, wet erase, or even permanent marker. Usable by experienced GMs and novices alike, Pathfinder Flip-Mats fit perfectly into any Game Master's arsenal!

pathfinderadventure_afewflowersmorepdf.human_name: Pathfinder Adventure: A Few Flowers More (PDF)
pathfinderadventure_afewflowersmorepdf.description_text:
FLOWER POWER!

A hero's work is never done! Especially when strange new plants start appearing in the woods—plants whose presence draws all manner of trespassers eager to take advantage of the sudden, mysterious bounty. But where are these plants coming from, and what sinister development in the heart of the forest does their arrival signify? Could it be the beginning of an invasion from another dimension... or something worse?

In A Few Flowers More, you take on the role of one of four unique leshys—mobile plants who have been granted wills of their own. When word of strange supernatural developments in the depths of the forest comes to light, it falls to you and your friends to take care of things!

A Few Flowers More is a short adventure for 4th-level characters that serves as a sequel to A Fistful of Flowers, yet it can be played on its own. This adventure takes a band of leshy heroes into the very depths of a primeval forest and pits them against a supernatural threat that's literally out of this world. The four pregenerated characters also provide a quick way to jump into this exciting Free RPG Day offering right away! Grab your friends, grab some dice, and play the role of the forest's newest heroes!

pathfinderflip-tiles_darklandsstarterset.description_text:
More tiles! More options! Convenient size! Create a path to the center of the world with just a flip! The new and useful Flip-Tiles: Darklands Starter Set features 42 full-color 6 x 6-inch map tiles, with twisted caverns, dank chambers, and other subterranean Darklands features, both sides stunningly crafted by cartographer Jason A. Engle. These exciting new tiles put an endless cavern complex your fingertips!

Suitable for experienced GMs and novices alike, this product fits perfectly into any Game Master's arsenal.

Used in Pathfinder Society Scenario 3–10: Dee the Pallid Depths.

takethis.description_text:
Payments to Take This are made via the PayPal Giving Fund.

Take This is a mental health nonprofit serving the game community/industry that provides resources, guidelines and training about mental health issues in the game community, thus reducing the stigma of mental illness.

Take This provides gamers and developers with resources, guidelines, and training that help them support themselves and others in dealing with mental health challenges.

Take This’ key programs are its AFK Room Program at conventions, its mental health consulting program for game developers, and its ambassador program for streamers.

from_bundle.tile_short_name: Pathfinder Primer Bundle by Paizo
from_bundle.marketing_blurb: Get Pathfinder GM Core (PDF), Lost Omens World Guide (PDF), Pathfinder Player Core (PDF), and more!
from_bundle.detailed_marketing_blurb: A world of adventure and danger awaits—and the only thing missing is your heroism. Gather your party of trusty companions for countless quests with our latest Pathfinder bundle from Paizo. Mix up your fun with the hottest Pathfinder TTRPG campaigns and expansions like Pathfinder Second Edition Beginner Box: Remastered Edition, Pathfinder Player Core, Sky King’s Tomb Player’s Guide, and more. Get everything you need to embark on an epic high-fantasy journey together, and help support Take This! with your purchase!
from_bundle.author: Paizo

basic_data.human_name: Learn Godot in 2025: Complete Course Bundle
basic_data.detailed_marketing_blurb: Your creative possibilities are limitless with the right game engine. Say hello to our latest Software Bundle: Learn Godot in 2025—a complete course collection designed to help you master Godot’s powerful, open-source, and beginner-friendly tools. Build any game you can imagine with step-by-step lessons like Make a Complete Bullet Hell from Scratch in Godot and Make a Fully-Fledged Farming RPG with Godot—then, learn to upload them online with Publishing to Steam for Godot Game Projects! Pay what you want for these great tools and help support NPower with your purchase.
basic_data.short_marketing_blurb: Harness the freedom to create with Godot
basic_data.description:
Harness the freedom to create with Godot. Your creative possibilities are limitless with the right game engine. Say hello to our latest Software Bundle: Learn Godot in 2025—a complete course collection designed to help you master Godot’s powerful, open-source, and beginner-friendly tools. Build any game you can imagine with step-by-step lessons like Make a Complete Bullet Hell from Scratch in Godot and Make a Fully-Fledged Farming RPG with Godot—then, learn to upload them online with Publishing to Steam for Godot Game Projects! Pay what you want for these great tools and help support NPower with your purchase.

Pay $1 or more. Normally, the total cost for the software in this bundle is as much as $1,500. Here at Humble Bundle, you choose the price and increase your contribution to upgrade your bundle! This bundle has a minimum $1 purchase. Pay $1 or more to access keys.

Redeem your keys. All of the software in this bundle is available for Windows, Mac, and Linux.

Support charity. Choose where the money goes - between the developer and to support NPower. If you like what we do, you can leave us a Humble Tip too!

uvmappinginblenderforbeginners.human_name: UV Mapping in Blender for Beginners
uvmappinginblenderforbeginners.description_text:
Master texturing in Blender by learning how to use UV maps!

UV mapping - a process by which you "unwrap" a 3D model into a flat surface - offers creators an easy way to paint complex textures. You'll explore creating UV maps for different 3D objects and set them up to suit your material's needs. These skills in UV mapping will provide you with key techniques to customize your 3D graphics to your exact specifications.

This course assumes basic familiarity with Blender.

You will learn how to:

  • Apply textures to an object
  • Create UV maps for primitive shapes
  • Build models suitable for UV mapping
  • Combine techniques to unwrap complex objects
  • Export UV maps for 2D software
  • Paint textures onto a flattened UV map

makeanrtsgameingodotfromstarttofinish202.human_name: Make an RTS Game in Godot from Start to Finish (2025 Edition)
makeanrtsgameingodotfromstarttofinish202.description_text:
Build a real-time strategy game from start to finish in Godot!

RTS games challenge players to think on their feet and make strategic decisions in dynamic environments. In this course, you'll create an engaging RTS game featuring player-controlled units, an AI team, and strategy-driven gameplay using modular systems. By creating an RTS game, you’ll explore one of gaming's most exciting genres while mastering key development skills like AI behavior, navigation systems, and game mechanics—unlocking opportunities for more advanced projects.

You’ll learn how to:
  • Design real-time strategy gameplay mechanics
  • Implement player-controlled unit selection
  • Program AI units with pathfinding
  • Apply navigation systems to avoid obstacles
  • Create dynamic win/loss systems
  • Add game juice and polish

... and more!

3daction-adventuregameingodot_unit1_char.human_name: 3D Action-Adventure Game in Godot - Unit 1 - Characters
3daction-adventuregameingodot_unit1_char.description_text:
Build an epic 3D action-adventure game from start to finish!

Action-adventure games, with their immersive gameplay and dynamic challenges, are a staple of modern gaming. Through this course, you'll explore the basics of creating characters in Godot - developing smooth animations, dynamic combat mechanics, and randomized enemies to bring your game to life. By mastering these techniques, you’ll be ready to expand into creating other 3D genres with confidence and add more advanced features to your action-adventure project.

You’ll learn how to:

  • Design and configure a 3D character
  • Animate actions with Godot’s animation trees
  • Add multiple weapons and shields
  • Generate enemies with random appearances
  • Program player combat mechanics, including defending
  • Work with inheritance for cleaner code

... and more!

learnuisystemsandlayoutsforgodot.human_name: Learn UI Systems and Layouts for Godot
learnuisystemsandlayoutsforgodot.description_text:
Master the essentials of designing responsive game UIs with Godot!

User interfaces (UI) are a core element of any game, bridging the gap between gameplay and the player’s experience. In this course, you will gain hands-on experience creating fully-fledged menus and UI layouts using Godot’s powerful layout system. By the end, you’ll have the skills to craft dynamic, adaptable interfaces ready for use in real-world game projects.

A basic understanding of Godot and GDScript is needed for this course.

You’ll learn how to:
  • Place and position UI elements
  • Add custom themes to your UI
  • Handle controller input for usability
  • Use containers for dynamic layouts
  • Work with presets and customizations
  • Design adaptable, scalable UI systems

... and more!

4xstrategygameingodotandc_unit3_units.human_name: 4X Strategy Game in Godot & C# - Unit 3 - Units
4xstrategygameingodotandc_unit3_units.description_text:
Expand your knowledge of 4X strategy games by learning how to spawn and manage units!

Unit mechanics are crucial for creating immersive 4X experiences - and a deep understanding of these will drive the exploration of your games. In this course, you'll use Godot and C# to build a comprehensive unit system, as well as implement a customizable main menu. These skills will not only round out your 4X strategy game-making skills, but open the doors to even more advanced strategy mechanics.

A solid understanding of Godot and C# is needed for this course.

You'll learn how to:

  • Spawn units from cities
  • Display unit data with UIs
  • Move units on the map
  • Implement unit combat mechanics
  • Capture cities using units
  • Create customizable overlays and menus

... and more!

introtogodot4gamedevelopment2025edition.human_name: Intro to Godot 4 Game Development (2025 Edition)
introtogodot4gamedevelopment2025edition.description_text:
Start your game development journey with Godot — the powerful, open-source game engine!

From its beginner-friendly workflow to its robust capabilities for professionals, mastering Godot opens up endless possibilities in the world of game development. In this course, you'll explore the essential features of Godot by gaining hands-on experience in core development tools, 2D design, 3D environments, and coding gameplay behaviors with GDScript from start to finish.

Dive in and gain the foundations you'll need to make RPGs, survival games, and more with Godot!

You’ll learn how to:

  • Navigate the Godot editor
  • Utilize core editing tools
  • Understand Nodes and Scenes
  • Work with 2D & 3D assets
  • Script gameplay behaviors with GDScript
  • Develop a basic interactive game

... and more!

developacomplete3dplatformeringodot2025e.human_name: Develop a Complete 3D Platformer in Godot (2025 Edition)
developacomplete3dplatformeringodot2025e.description_text:
Craft a complete 3D platformer game from start to finish!

3D platformers are a staple of game design, combining engaging challenges with rewarding exploration across dynamic environments. In this course, you’ll harness the power of Godot to create a fully-fledged 3D platformer game, complete with collectible items, enemy hazards, and multiple levels. By walking through every step of development, you’ll not only build a compelling game but also gain practical experience that will equip you to tackle even more complex 3D game projects.

You’ll learn how to:

  • Set up levels using Godot's 3D tools
  • Create a responsive player controller
  • Enhance player movements with visual feedback
  • Implement collectibles with scores and effects
  • Design custom enemy behaviors
  • Build seamless level transitions

... and more!

makeafully-fledgedfarmingrpgwithgodot202.human_name: Make a Fully-Fledged Farming RPG with Godot (2025 Edition)
makeafully-fledgedfarmingrpgwithgodot202.description_text:
Create a farming RPG from start to finish in Godot!

Farming RPGs are a cornerstone of the game development world, seamlessly blending creativity, resource management, and engaging progression systems. In this course, you’ll build a complete tile-based farming RPG complete with seed planting, crop nurturing, harvesting, and more. By mastering the modular concepts featured, you'll be ready to expand these skills for your own project or add farming mechanics to any existing Godot project.

You’ll learn how to:

  • Interact with and modify TileMaps
  • Use Autoloads for global managers
  • Script crop growth and harvesting cycles
  • Handle in-game purchases and inventory
  • Organize logic with GDScript dictionaries
  • Structure mechanics with custom GDScript classes

... and more!

npower.description_text:
Donations to support NPower are made to  PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.

NPower is a national nonprofit, rooted in community that is committed to empowering young adults and military connected individuals to thrive in the digital economy through transformative IT training, creating pathways to economic prosperity. Through skills training, real-world experience, support and mentorship, NPower graduates launch burgeoning careers and a pathway to financial freedom for themselves and their families.

makeacompletebullethellfromscratchingodo.human_name: Make a Complete Bullet Hell from Scratch in Godot (2025 Edition)
makeacompletebullethellfromscratchingodo.description_text:
Craft a fully-fledged bullet hell game in Godot!

Bullet hell games are renowned for their fast-paced action, dense attack patterns, and the technical challenge of managing hundreds of objects on screen - making them a fantastic way to advance your game development skills. In this course, you’ll build a complete bullet hell experience, mastering techniques such as node pooling, scene inheritance, and randomization. These new skills will vastly enhance your Godot skills and enable you to make increasingly complex games with many objects.

You’ll learn how to:

  • Implement efficient object pooling
  • Utilize scene inheritance for scaling
  • Create dynamic object spawn systems
  • Work with sprite sheets and tilemaps
  • Add polished audio and SFX
  • Design pickups and stat upgrades

... and more!

godot4mini-projects2025edition.description_text:
Learn essential game development tools through engaging Godot mini-projects!

Godot is a leading open-source game engine known for its flexibility in creating both 2D and 3D games. In this course, you'll create four practical mini-projects designed to solidify your grasp on crucial game mechanics and programming concepts. From mouse input handling to 2D physics systems and collision detection, these hands-on projects will form the foundation needed to build more complex, complete games in the future.

You’ll learn how to:

  • Implement mouse-click-driven interactions
  • Work with Godot’s physics engine
  • Detect collisions and handle responses
  • Use loops to automate complex systems
  • Create dynamic UI for player interaction
  • Communicate between scripts

... and more!

2dcozysandboxingodot_unit2_toolmechanics.human_name: Cozy Sandbox in Godot - Unit 2 - Tool Mechanics
2dcozysandboxingodot_unit2_toolmechanics.description_text:
Unlock interactive tool mechanics for your cozy sandbox adventure!

Tool mechanics breathe life into sandbox games, enabling players to build, farm, and explore with creativity. In this course, you’ll develop a complete tool system for your 2D Godot game while mastering system toggling and unique interactions for tools like watering cans, axes, and more. These skills will give you the modular techniques needed to add tools to any game and connect different, complex game systems together with ease!

An intermediate understanding of Godot and GDScript is needed for this course.

You’ll learn how to:
  • Utilize enums and data typing
  • Manipulate TileMap layers via script
  • Set up basic combat systems
  • Build plant growing systems
  • Create interactive tool mechanics end-to-end
  • Add basic weather to games

... and more!

4xstrategygameingodotandc_unit2_cityspaw.human_name: 4X Strategy Game in Godot & C# - Unit 2 - City Spawning
4xstrategygameingodotandc_unit2_cityspaw.description_text:
Explore spawning resources, cities, and more for 4X strategy games.

Cities are an integral part of 4X strategy game development and represent one of the core mechanics of how they work. In this course, you'll master the intricacies of city spawning on a procedural hexagonal-based map and advanced UI management using Godot and C#. These skills will enable you to further master strategy game development and expand procedural map generation with functional game mechanics.

A solid understanding of Godot and C# is needed for this course.

You will learn how to:

  • Select and manipulate hex map tiles
  • Add randomized resources to tiles
  • Manage UI events effectively
  • Differentiate signals and delegates
  • Spawn and manage game cities
  • Generate random faction colors

... and more!

uiuxforgamedesign.description_text:
Discover UI and UX design principles for games!

The user interface and user experience play a critical role in communicating information to players and creating smooth, interactive gameplay. In this course, you'll build a UI/UX mockup for a mobile game while exploring design methodologies and wireframing techniques. These techniques will provide you new ways to approach UI/UX game design and to meaningfully apply iterative design to optimize your game's experience.

You will learn how to:

  • Understand users with user stories
  • Create definitive design criteria
  • Utilize wireframes for mockups
  • Apply common design conventions
  • Test and iterate design choices
  • Recognize design processes

... and more!

magicavoxelforbeginners_createvoxelgamea.human_name: MagicaVoxel for Beginners - Create Voxel Game Assets
magicavoxelforbeginners_createvoxelgamea.description_text:
Not an artist, but eager to create Minecraft-style voxel art models for your Unity games? Discover how to build your own 3D game models with MagicaVoxel - the free program that will enable you to build simple game models and environment. No experience in MagicaVoxel, 3D modeling or artistic experience is required - you will be shown how to use the essential tools from scratch, and how to export them into Unity.

Topics included
  • Using the different brushes and tools
  • Camera controls to navigate your scene
  • Creating a voxel art tree, a character, and a landscape
  • Importing models into Unity
  • Working with color palettes

... and more!

buildacompleteroguelikefromscratchwithgo.human_name: Build a Complete Roguelike from Scratch with Godot (2025 Edition)
buildacompleteroguelikefromscratchwithgo.description_text:
Master roguelike development from start to finish with Godot.

A staple of game development, the roguelike genre provides a framework for creating endlessly replayable and dynamic experiences for players. Through this course, you’ll construct a fully-fledged, action-packed roguelike game featuring procedural generation, challenging enemies, and powerful items. These modular-based skills will empower you to customize and expand upon the project, creating unique and complex roguelike worlds of your own.

You will learn how to:

  • Generate procedural room layouts
  • Design unique enemies and bosses
  • Implement a functional mini-map
  • Add sounds and damage visuals
  • Create collectible player items
  • Manage room states with doors

... and more!

3daction-adventuregameingodot_unit3_worl.human_name: 3D Action-Adventure Game in Godot - Unit 3 - World
3daction-adventuregameingodot_unit3_worl.description_text:
Create fully-fledged 3D levels in Godot!

Action-adventure games hinge on immersive environments, and creating compelling levels is a crucial skill for any game developer. In this course, you'll create two distinct 3D levels - an overworld imported from Blender and a modular castle built with Godot's grid maps - while enhancing them with custom shaders for water, grass, and lava to blend functionality with visual appeal. By the end, you’ll have the skills to complete your own fully-fledged action-adventure game, ready to expand into more complex 3D projects.

You’ll learn how to:

  • Use 3D models from Blender
  • Create modular levels with grid maps
  • Build shaders for water, grass, & lava
  • Implement level transition systems
  • Add environmental variety for player immersion
  • Implement item pickups

... and more!

2dcozysandboxingodot_unit3_basebuilding.human_name: Cozy Sandbox in Godot - Unit 3 - Base Building
2dcozysandboxingodot_unit3_basebuilding.description_text:
Build a fully-fledged base-building system in your own cozy sandbox game!

Base building and resource management are essential skills for sandbox games that invite creativity and replayability. In this course, you'll expand a 2D tile-based world with a construction mechanic, letting players gather resources and shape their environment. By weaving together multiple complex features, you’ll master integrating systems vital for advanced sandbox game development and set the stage for larger-scale, real-world Godot projects.

You'll learn how to:
  • Implement player-driven building systems
  • Design resource gathering mechanics
  • Work with advanced TileMap layers
  • Dynamically place objects in game worlds
  • Integrate tools, resources, and UI
  • Organize code for complex features

... and more!

publishingtosteamforgodotgameprojects.human_name: Publishing to Steam for Godot Game Projects
publishingtosteamforgodotgameprojects.description_text:
Publish your Godot game to Steam with confidence!

Steamworks provides crucial tools for developers, enabling seamless publishing, player interaction, and monetization for games on Steam. In this course, you'll learn how to integrate Steamworks into your Godot project, equipping you to bring your games to a global audience as a fully-fledged Steam release. By completing the course, you’ll understand how to polish your game for publication and uncover the tools necessary to implement real-world features like achievements and player stats.

You’ll learn how to:

  • Initialize Steamworks in a Godot project
  • Fetch user-specific data
  • Integrate player avatars into the UI
  • Track and unlock Steam achievements
  • Modify and display in-game stats
  • Prepare your game for Steam publishing

... and more!

explorevfxwithparticlesingodot2025editio.human_name: Explore VFX with Particles in Godot (2025 Edition)
explorevfxwithparticlesingodot2025editio.description_text:
Bring your games to life with dazzling visual effects in Godot!

No matter the game, particles can provide the magic touch that transforms ordinary scenes into unforgettable moments. Through this course, you’ll dive into Godot's flexible particle system as you build a suite of five real-world effects, including fire, rain, and more. These projects will help you master the core settings and tools needed to create unique visual effects - which can easily be applied to your own Godot projects!

You will learn how to:
  • Work with versatile particle emitters
  • Create sparks with gravity and collision
  • Design immersive fire and smoke effects
  • Script interactive walking dirt trails
  • Craft custom impact (hit) particles
  • Simulate atmospheric rain with collisions

... and more!

createacomplete2dplatformeringodot2025ed.human_name: Create a Complete 2D Platformer in Godot (2025 Edition)
createacomplete2dplatformeringodot2025ed.description_text:
Build a fully-fledged 2D platformer using Godot!

Creating platformer games is one of the most exciting and versatile ways to explore 2D game mechanics, with a great blend of player movement, enemy AI, and interactive objects. In this course, you'll construct a complete 2D platformer game from scratch – learning core mechanics like platforming fundamentals, health systems, coin collection, and level progression. By the end, you’ll have a polished, engaging 2D platformer and the skills to expand into any sort of 2D game you might imagine!

You’ll learn how to:

  • Set up a fully functional player
  • Create enemies with basic AI behavior
  • Design and implement a health system
  • Add a coin collection and scoring system
  • Use persistent data across multiple scenes
  • Set up level transitions with end flags

... and more!

4xstrategygameingodotandc_unit1_hex-base.human_name: 4X Strategy Game in Godot & C# - Unit 1 - Hex-Based Map
4xstrategygameingodotandc_unit1_hex-base.description_text:
Unlock the secrets to creating engaging 4X strategy games from scratch!

Strategy games are known for their rich mechanics and complex features, with many rooted in hex-based map designs. In this course, you’ll embark on a journey to develop a turn-based strategy game using Godot and C# by learning the essential skills for creating a map from hexagonal tiles. These skills will not only put you on the starting path for making strategy games, but give you map skills that can be used in a variety of other genres and projects!

You'll learn how to:

  • Create procedural terrain generation
  • Work with Godot's tilemap layers
  • Implement camera panning & zooming
  • Handle mouse input for map scrolling
  • Utilize the FastNoiseLite generator
  • Apply C# LINQ for data queries

... and more!

introtoriggingmodelsinblender.human_name: Intro to Rigging Models in Blender
introtoriggingmodelsinblender.description_text:
Prepare your 3D models for animation!

Rigging is an important technique for 3D animation by which one creates a skeletal-like armature that can be manipulated to move parts of the 3D mesh around. You’ll discover everything required for rigging – from setting up the “bones” to weight painting and controlling which parts of the mesh are affected by each bone.

By the end, you’ll have the foundations you’ll need to master rigging any kind of 3D model and expand your skills in creating custom assets.

You will learn how to:

  • Create bones to build an armature

  • Connect your armature and 3D mesh

  • Control affected vertices with weight painting

  • Export rigged models

  • Apply Mixamo animations to your models

buildawalkingsimulatorwithgodot4.human_name: Build a Walking Simulator with Godot 4
buildawalkingsimulatorwithgodot4.description_text:
Discover the fundamentals for walking simulators in Godot 4!

Walking simulators are a popular genre for storytellers looking for new ways to convey atmosphere and visuals with their tales. In this course, you'll create modular systems for players and interactive elements that can easily be dragged and dropped into any sort of walking simulator-like game. These skills will provide you with the core features to be able to tell a multitude of stories and expand into similar genres such as horror, survival, and more.

Basic familiarity with Godot and GDScript is needed for this course.

You will learn how to:

  • Set up input controls
  • Generate navigatable terrain
  • Work with first-person cameras
  • Implement walking, sprinting, and jumping
  • Improve overall game feel
  • Create multi-use interaction systems

... and more!

2dcozysandboxingodot_unit1_playerandworl.human_name: Cozy Sandbox in Godot - Unit 1 - Player & World
2dcozysandboxingodot_unit1_playerandworl.description_text:
Build the core systems behind your own 2D cozy sandbox game!

A charming sandbox experience begins with a lively player and a richly interactive world - essentials that bring cozy games to life and make the genre popular with players. In this course, you’ll create a complete player character with detailed animations, design tile-based worlds with auto-tiling, and add atmosphere using day-night cycles and background music. With these skills, you’ll be ready to implement 2D animations or tilemaps in any future Godot project with streamlined techniques!

You’ll learn how to:

  • Set up animated player characters
  • Master AnimationTree for movement
  • Create layered TileMap environments
  • Implement auto-tiling techniques
  • Build seamless day/night cycles
  • Add background music and SFX

... and more!

introtothegamedevelopmentindustry.human_name: Intro to the Game Development Industry
introtothegamedevelopmentindustry.description_text:
Learn how the video game industry works!

Video games are a well-established, profitable industry with unique characteristics that support the development process. You'll explore the industry's structure by learning the overall stages of development, how work is divided by role, and more. This information will help you interact with the game industry with solid footing and have a greater understanding of how games are made.

No prior experience with the game industry is needed.

You'll learn all about:

  • Job roles & responsibilities
  • Large vs. small companies
  • The development cycle
  • IP copyrights
  • NDAs

... and more!

learn3dmodelingwithblenderfromscratch.human_name: Learn 3D Modeling with Blender from Scratch
learn3dmodelingwithblenderfromscratch.description_text:
Master the foundations of Blender and 3D modeling!

3D modeling, the process of creating digital 3D objects, is a robust field of study with real-world applications for animation, game development, and more. In this course, you'll explore the free and open-source Blender software and learn the fundamental techniques for manipulating meshes and creating custom assets. These skills will form the basis for expanding your 3D modeling skills and open up opportunities to create unique assets for your projects.

No prior experience is needed for this course.

You will learn how to:

  • Understand how 3D objects work
  • Move, rotate, and scale objects
  • Edit vertices, edges, and faces
  • Work with Blender's modifiers
  • Apply materials to meshes
  • Export models for other programs

... and more!

3daction-adventuregameingodot_unit2_inve.human_name: 3D Action-Adventure Game in Godot - Unit 2 - Inventory
3daction-adventuregameingodot_unit2_inve.description_text:
Master advanced inventory systems for 3D action-adventure games in Godot!

Inventory systems are a cornerstone of action-adventure games, enhancing player engagement by providing seamless item management and customization options. Through this course, you'll construct a complete inventory system from start to finish, enabling players to select weapons, shields, and style items with a dynamic 3D preview. These skills will empower you to develop robust inventory management for immersive game worlds.

You’ll learn how to:

  • Build dynamic UI layouts with Godot
  • Create inventory systems for equippable items
  • Implement 3D item preview functionality
  • Work with anchors, containers, and layout nodes
  • Develop interactivity using GDScript logic
  • Add visual enhancements to improve aesthetics

... and more!

constructamultiplayerlobbyingodot.human_name: Construct a Multiplayer Lobby in Godot
constructamultiplayerlobbyingodot.description_text:
Build a multiplayer lobby with Godot's networking tools!

Multiplayer is a core feature in many of today’s most popular games, offering engaging social experiences for players. In this course, you'll create a complete multiplayer lobby system with player joining, management tools, and seamless game scene transitions, ready to integrate into a sample multiplayer platformer game. By mastering these concepts, you’ll have the confidence to implement robust player management systems for any kind of multiplayer game you have in mind.

You’ll learn how to:

  • Connect players using IP and port setup
  • Construct UI elements for lobby systems
  • Display users by username
  • Individualize host and client control tools
  • Transition players into game scenes seamlessly
  • Synchronize player input using server logic

... and more!

buildpracticalreal-worldappsusinggodot.human_name: Build Practical Real-World Apps using Godot
buildpracticalreal-worldappsusinggodot.description_text:
Master real-world app development with Godot!

Godot isn’t just for games - this versatile, open-source engine is perfect for creating useful, fully-fledged applications as well! In this course, you’ll build two complete projects from start to finish: a calculator and a Body Mass Index (BMI) measurer, each with fully functional light and dark modes. By the end, you'll have a great understanding of how to harness Godot’s powerful tools and elevate your skills to tackle even more complex real-world projects.

You’ll learn how to:

  • Design themes with Godot’s styling tools
  • Validate and filter user input effectively
  • Write dynamic calculations using expressions
  • Toggle between light and dark UI modes
  • Optimize apps with advanced node structures
  • Explore Godot’s potential beyond game creation

... and more!

intermediategodot_essentialprogrammingpa.description_text:
Unlock the power of coding design patterns in Godot!

Mastering design patterns is crucial for creating scalable and modular game code - regardless of the project you're building. Through this course, you'll deepen your understanding of GDScript by implementing the SOLID principles alongside industry-standard coding patterns. These insights into programming patterns will empower you to tackle more ambitious game projects, ensuring your skills evolve from start to finish.

An intermediate understanding of Godot and GDScript is needed for this course.

You'll learn how to:

  • Apply SOLID coding principles
  • Implement singletons in Godot
  • Use the observer pattern effectively
  • Execute the command pattern
  • Master object pooling techniques
  • Optimize for scalable game design

... and more!

npower.description_text:
Donations to support NPower are made to  PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.

NPower is a national nonprofit, rooted in community that is committed to empowering young adults and military connected individuals to thrive in the digital economy through transformative IT training, creating pathways to economic prosperity. Through skills training, real-world experience, support and mentorship, NPower graduates launch burgeoning careers and a pathway to financial freedom for themselves and their families.

from_bundle.tile_short_name: Learn Godot in 2025: Complete Course Bundle
from_bundle.short_marketing_blurb: Harness the freedom to create with Godot
from_bundle.marketing_blurb: Get UI/UX for Game Design, Intro to Rigging Models in Blender, Intro to the Game Development Industry, and more!
from_bundle.detailed_marketing_blurb: Your creative possibilities are limitless with the right game engine. Say hello to our latest Software Bundle: Learn Godot in 2025—a complete course collection designed to help you master Godot’s powerful, open-source, and beginner-friendly tools. Build any game you can imagine with step-by-step lessons like Make a Complete Bullet Hell from Scratch in Godot and Make a Fully-Fledged Farming RPG with Godot—then, learn to upload them online with Publishing to Steam for Godot Game Projects! Pay what you want for these great tools and help support NPower with your purchase.
from_bundle.author: Zenva Pty Ltd

basic_data.human_name: The Best of Humble Bundle: LEGO Worlds Collide 2025
basic_data.detailed_marketing_blurb:
We’re stacking up great games brick-by-brick with the all-new LEGO Worlds Collide Bundle! This gigantic bundle from Warner Bros. mixes your favorite franchises with the unmistakable LEGO charm to create unique gaming experiences that puts you in the shoes of your favorite characters. Play LEGO® Star Wars™: The Skywalker Saga, LEGO® Marvel Super Heroes 2 Deluxe Edition, LEGO® Batman™ 3: Beyond Gotham Premium Edition, and become the LEGO hero of legend! Pay what you want for the ultimate LEGO bundle, and help support Raiden Science Foundation with your purchase!

Keys expire. Please redeem your key before March 24th. 2026.
basic_data.short_marketing_blurb: A LEGO world for every interest
basic_data.description:
A LEGO world for every interest. We’re stacking up great games brick-by-brick with the all-new LEGO Worlds Collide Bundle! This gigantic bundle from Warner Bros. mixes your favorite franchises with the unmistakable LEGO charm to create unique gaming experiences that puts you in the shoes of your favorite characters. Play LEGO® Star Wars™: The Skywalker Saga, LEGO® Marvel Super Heroes 2 Deluxe Edition, LEGO® Batman™ 3: Beyond Gotham Premium Edition, and become the LEGO hero of legend! Pay what you want for the ultimate LEGO bundle, and help support Raiden Science Foundation with your purchase!

Keys expire. Please redeem keys before March 24th, 2026.

Pay $5 or more. Normally, the total cost for the games in this bundle is as much as $499. Here at Humble Bundle, you choose the price and increase your contribution to upgrade your bundle! This bundle has a minimum $5 purchase. Pay $5 or more to access Steam keys.

Redeem on Steam. All of the games in this bundle are available on Steam for Windows. Please check out the full system requirements here prior to purchasing.

Support charity. Choose where the money goes - between the developer and to support Fight4Rare aka Raiden Science Foundation. If you like what we do, you can leave us a Humble Tip too!

lego_dcsupervillains.callout: For the first time in a LEGO game, you play as the villains. The story has you team up with The Joker and Harley Quinn to save Earth from a new group of heroes from a parallel universe. Deluxe Edition includes the Season Pass, which adds new characters and levels.
lego_dcsupervillains.description_text:
<html>
 <head>
 </head>
 <body>
  It's good to be bad… Embark on an all-new DC/LEGO® adventure by becoming the best villain the universe has seen. Players will create and play as an all-new super-villain throughout the game, unleashing mischievous antics and wreaking havoc in an action-packed story. Set in an open world experience within the DC universe, the Justice League has disappeared, leaving Earth's protection to their counterparts, who have proclaimed themselves as the "Justice Syndicate". It's up to you and a crazy group of misfits to uncover the intentions of Earth's new, strange, wannabe superheroes. Joined by renowned DC Super-Villains: The Joker, Harley Quinn, and countless others from the Injustice League, players will set out on an epic adventure.
 </body>
</html>

thelegoninjagomovievideogame.human_name: The LEGO NINJAGO Movie Video Game
thelegoninjagomovievideogame.callout: Play as the ninja heroes of Ninjago, learning to masteryour skills and defend the island from the evil Lord Garmadon. The game features new combat mechanics and a large open world to explore.
thelegoninjagomovievideogame.description_text: Find your inner ninja with the all-new LEGO NINJAGO Movie Video Game! Play as your favorite ninjas, Lloyd, Jay, Kai, Cole, Zane, Nya and Master Wu to defend their home island of Ninjago from the evil Lord Garmadon and his Shark Army. Master the art of Ninjagility by wall-running, high-jumping and battling the foes of Ninjago to rank up and upgrade the ninja's combat skills. Only in the LEGO NINJAGO Movie Video Game will you experience the film across 8 action packed locations each with its own unique Challenge Dojo. And with the Battle Maps, play against friends and family in competitions for up to four players!

lego_marvelsuperheroes2.human_name: LEGO® Marvel Super Heroes 2 DELUXE EDITION
lego_marvelsuperheroes2.callout: An open-world adventure where you team up with heroes and villains from across different eras and realities to take down the time-traveling Kang the Conqueror. Deluxe Edition includes the Season Pass, granting access to new levels and characters.
lego_marvelsuperheroes2.description_text: It's about TIME! Join your favorite Super Heroes and Super Villains from different eras and realities as they go head-to-head with the time-traveling Kang the Conqueror in the all-new, original adventure, LEGO® Marvel Super Heroes 2! Play as the Guardians of the Galaxy, Spider-Man, Thor, Hulk, Black Panther, Captain Marvel, Doctor Strange, Green Goblin and dozens of other Marvel Super Heroes and Villains in this cosmic battle across the time-tossed city of Chronopolis! Travel across lands -- from Ancient Egypt to The Old West, Sakaar and New York City in 2099 -- and transport objects or characters through the centuries! And, with new battle modes, friends and family can play against each other in a series of themed challenges and battle arenas!

lego_lordoftherings.human_name: LEGO® The Lord of the Rings
lego_lordoftherings.callout: Game covers the events of all three Lord of the Rings films. You can play as Frodo, Aragorn, and many other characters as you journey to Mount Doom.
lego_lordoftherings.description_text:
Based on The Lord of the Rings motion picture trilogy, LEGO® The Lord of the Rings follows the original story-lines of The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring, The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers, and The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King, taking players through the epic story events re-imagined with the humor and endless variety of LEGO play.

Trusted with the dangerous task to destroy an ancient magical ring that threatens all that is good, Frodo is forced to leave his peaceful home. But the ring wants to be found and the road to Mount Doom, the only place where it can be destroyed, will be perilous and riddled with Orcs and fouler things. To help Frodo, a Fellowship is formed —Aragorn the Ranger, Gandalf the Wizard, Legolas the Elf, Gimli the Dwarf, Boromir a Man of Gondor, and Frodo’s Hobbit friends Sam, Merry and Pippin. Players relive the legend through the LEGO mini-figures, as they explore wonders, solve timeless riddles, and overcome endless foes in their quest to destroy the Ring.

Key Features:
  • Explore all of the open-world of Middle-earth and experience epic battles with Orcs, Uruk-hai, the Balrog, the Witch-king, and other fearsome creatures.
  • Wield the power of the Palantír or Seeing-stone (‘one that looks far-away’), and jump between multiple story-lines.
  • Experience the LEGO The Lord of the Rings heroes come to life in an all new way with the mini-fig characters delivering the dialogue from the films.
  • Collect, combine and forge new items in the Blacksmith Shop using Mithril, the most precious metal in Middle-earth.
  • Discover and unlock over more than 80 playable characters, including Frodo, Aragorn, Gandalf, and many others.
  • Collect and use a variety of weaponry and magical items, including the Light of Earendil, Elven rope, swords, and bows.
  • Play with family and friends with easy access drop-in, drop-out game play option.

 

LEGO THE LORD OF THE RINGS software © 2012 TT Games Publishing Ltd. Produced by TT Games under license from the LEGO Group. LEGO, the LEGO logo, the Brick and the Knob configurations and the Minifigure are trademarks of the LEGO Group. © 2012 The LEGO group. © 2012 New Line Productions Inc. All The Lord of the Rings content other than content from the New Line films © 2012 The Saul Zaentz Company d/b/a Middle-earth Enterprises (“SZC”). Mithril, The Lord of the Rings and the names of the characters, items, events and places therein are trademarks of SZC under license to Warner Bros. Interactive Entertainment. All other trademarks and copyrights are the property of their respective owners. All rights reserved.

WB GAMES LOGO, WBIE LOGO, WB SHIELD: ™ & © Warner Bros. Entertainment Inc.
(s12)

lego_starwars_theforceawakens.human_name: LEGO® Star Wars™: The Force Awakens DELUXE EDITION
lego_starwars_theforceawakens.callout: This game retells the story of the Force Awakens film while also adding new content that bridges the gap between Return of the Jedi and The Force Awakens. Deluxe Edition includes the Season Pass, with new characters, levels, and starship missions.
lego_starwars_theforceawakens.description_text:
The Force is strong with this one… The No. 1 LEGO® videogame franchise triumphantly returns with a fun-filled, humorous journey through the new Star Wars adventure. Play as all of the characters from the movie, including Rey, Finn, Poe Dameron, Han Solo, Chewbacca, C-3PO, and BB-8, as well as Kylo Ren, General Hux and Captain Phasma.

In LEGO® Star Wars™: The Force Awakens™, relive the epic action from the blockbuster film in way that only LEGO can offer, featuring brand new story content from the Star Wars Universe that explores the time between Star Wars: Return of the Jedi and Star Wars: The Force Awakens.

LEGO Star Wars: The Force Awakens introduces new gameplay mechanics, including the enhanced Multi-Builds system, where players can choose from multiple building options to advance the game, or engage in intense new Blaster Battles for the first time, utilizing surrounding environments to drive back the First Order."

legostarwars_theskywalkersaga_deluxe.human_name: LEGO Star Wars: The Skywalker Saga - Deluxe Edition
legostarwars_theskywalkersaga_deluxe.callout: Play through all nine Skywalker saga films in a brand-new LEGO style. Deluxe Edition includes the base game and seven character packs from beyond the films.
legostarwars_theskywalkersaga_deluxe.description_text:
Pre-order the game and get day one access to the Trooper Pack. The digital edition also includes an exclusive classic Obi-Wan playable character. Play all nine Star Wars saga films in an all-new game and journey to a galaxy far, far, away.

Play through all nine Star Wars saga films in a brand-new LEGO video game unlike any other. Experience fun-filled adventures, whimsical humor, and the freedom to fully immerse yourself in the LEGO Star Wars galaxy.

Want to play as a Jedi? A Sith? Rebel, bounty hunter, or droid? LEGO Star Wars: The Skywalker Saga features hundreds of playable characters from throughout the galaxy. Whether on land or in space, a variety of vehicles are yours to command. Jump to light speed in the Millennium Falcon, fly the T-47 Airspeeder and battle TIE fighters in Resistance X-wings… it's the ULTIMATE LEGO Star Wars experience.

legotheincredibles.callout: This game covers the stories of both The Incredibles and Incredibles 2. You play as the Parr family, using your unique super powers to fight crime and rebuild the city. The game features a hub world where you can explore and find new quests.
legotheincredibles.description_text:
<html>
 <head>
 </head>
 <body>
  Experience the thrilling adventures of the Parr family as they conquer crime and family life through both Disney-Pixar films The Incredibles and Incredibles 2, in a LEGO® world full of fun and humor. LEGO® The Incredibles allows players to explore action-packed story levels and an epic hub world - including Municiberg, as they use their unique “Super” abilities to bring the city’s Super Villains to justice. Gamers can also team up with family and friends in 2 player co-op to assemble incredible LEGO® builds!
 </body>
</html>

legobatman3_beyondgotham.human_name: LEGO® Batman™ 3: Beyond Gotham PREMIUM EDITION
legobatman3_beyondgotham.callout: Batman joins forces with the DC Super Heroes to stop the evil Brainiac from shrinking Earth. Premium Edition includes the Season Pass, with new character packs and levels based on popular TV shows and films.
legobatman3_beyondgotham.description_text:
The best-selling LEGO Batman videogame franchise returns in an out-of-this-world, action-packed adventure! In LEGO Batman™ 3: Beyond Gotham, the Caped Crusader joins forces with the super heroes of the DC Comics universe and blasts off to outer space to stop the evil Brainiac from destroying Earth. Using the power of the Lantern Rings, Brainiac shrinks worlds to add to his twisted collection of miniature cities from across the universe. Now the greatest super heroes and the most cunning villains must unite and journey to different Lantern Worlds to collect the Lantern Rings and stop Brainiac before it’s too late.

• Exciting space combat - For the first time ever, battle with Batman and his allies in outer space and the various Lantern worlds including Zamaron and Odym.
• Robust roster of DC Comics heroes and villains - Play and unlock more than 150 unique characters with amazing powers and abilities, including members of the Justice League, and BIG LEGO Figures such as Cyborg, Solomon Grundy and more.
• Unique storyline with new plots and twists –Surprising disguises, Brainiac’s mind control ability, and the power of the Lantern rings bring a whole new twist to characters you thought you knew.
• Hack computer terminals - Enter a virtual world to escape mazes, battle in arenas, and race to find the code.
• Bat-tastic Gadget Wheel - With a simple press of a button, choose and upgrade select character’s suits and abilities.
• Variety of iconic locales - Visit the Hall of Justice, the Batcave, and the Justice League Watchtower to access shops, trophy rooms, and the hero and vehicle customizers.

lego_marvel_superheroes.callout: This game has you take on the roles of heroes from across the Marvel Universe as you try to stop Doctor Doom from building a superweapon. The game features a large open-world Manhattan to explore and over 100 playable characters
lego_marvel_superheroes.description_text:
LEGO® Marvel™ Super Heroes features an original story crossing the entire Marvel Universe. Players take control of Iron Man, Spider-Man, the Hulk, Captain America, Wolverine and many more Marvel characters as they unite to stop Loki and a host of other Marvel villains from assembling a super-weapon capable of destroying the world. Players will chase down Cosmic Bricks as they travel across LEGO Manhattan and visit key locations from the Marvel Universe, such as Stark Tower, Asteroid M, a Hydra base and the X-Mansion.

  • Smash, swing and fly in the first LEGO videogame featuring more than 100 of your favorite Super Heroes and Super Villains from the Marvel Universe, including Iron Man, Wolverine, the Hulk, Spider-Man, Captain America, Black Widow, Loki and Deadpool.
  • Help save Earth as your favorite Marvel character with your super-cool strengths and abilities:
    • Iron Man flies, hovers, shoots missiles and unleashes a powerful unibeam directly from his chest.
    • Spider-Man shoots webs, uses his spider-senses to spot objects invisible to others, crawls up walls and, of course, web-slings.
    • Captain America throws his mighty shield at objects and enemies, embeds it into a wall to create a platform, and protects himself from damage.
    • Hulk smashes!
  • Perform new and powerful moves as “BIG-fig” characters like Hulk and Abomination. Leave a path of destruction as you smash through LEGO walls and throw cars using hyper strength.
  • Discover LEGO Manhattan like never before, and travel to iconic locations from the Marvel Universe, such as the X-Mansion, Asteroid M and Asgard.
  • Create unique Super Heroes with customizable characters.
  • Enjoy an exciting original story, filled with classic LEGO videogame adventure and humor.

thelegomovie2videogame.callout: Based on the 2nd film, this game has you explore a wide variety of worlds from the LEGO universe to save your friends. You can build unique items, solve puzzles, and fight alien invaders.
thelegomovie2videogame.description_text:
<html>
 <head>
 </head>
 <body>
  The alien monster invaders have left Bricksburg in ruins and taken Emmet's friends! It is now up to Emmet and a host of heroic characters to go beyond their world and save their friends from the strange inhabitants of the Systar System. Journey into outer space, discover new worlds, and test your Master Building skills.
 </body>
</html>

lego_hobbit.callout: This game covers the events of the first two Hobbit films, An Unexpected Journey and The Desolation of Smaug. You can play as Bilbo Baggins and the thirteen Dwarves, Gandalf and more as you travel to the Lonely Mountain.
lego_hobbit.description_text:
Reclaim the Lost Kingdom brick by brick! Join Bilbo Baggins, Gandalf, Thorin and his company of Dwarves in an epic adventure across Middle-earth to recapture the Lonely Mountain in the most expansive LEGO game to date.

• Battle ravenous Trolls, dangerous Orcs and many more!
• Combine the Dwarves' unique abilities to solve puzzles - often with hilarious results!
• Explore iconic locations in Middle-earth, from the Shire to Goblin-town and beyond.

lego_batman.callout: The first game in the LEGO Batman series. You can play as Batman and Robin to stop a cast of super-villains from taking over Gotham City. You can also play through a villain campaign to see the story from a different perspective.
lego_batman.description_text:
<html>
 <head>
 </head>
 <body>
  When all the villains in Arkham Asylum team up and break loose, only the dynamic duo is bold enough to take them on to save Gotham City. The fun of LEGO, the drama of Batman and the uniqueness of the combination makes for a comical and exciting adventure in LEGO Batman: The Videogame. Play as Batman and his sidekick Robin as you build, drive, swing and fight your way through Gotham City capturing escaped villains including The Joker, Penguin, Scarecrow and more. Then, jump into the story from the other side and play as Batmans foes! Enjoy the power you wield and battle Batman while spreading chaos throughout the city. There is no rest for the good (or evil!).
 </body>
</html>

lego_worlds.callout: An open-world sandbox game where you can create and destroy anything you want. You can build anything you can imagine, from a simple house to a sprawling city, and explore worlds full of different environments and creatures.
lego_worlds.description_text:
EXPLORE. DISCOVER. CREATE. TOGETHER. LEGO® Worlds is an open environment of procedurally-generated Worlds made entirely of LEGO bricks which you can freely manipulate and dynamically populate with LEGO models. Create anything you can imagine one brick at a time, or use large-scale landscaping tools to create vast mountain ranges and dot your world with tropical islands. Drop in prefabricated structures to build and customize any world to your liking. Explore using helicopters, dragons, motorbikes or even gorillas and unlock treasures that enhance your gameplay. Watch your creations come to life through characters and creatures that interact with you and each other in unexpected ways. In LEGO Worlds, anything is possible!

https://go.wbgames.com/privacy-center

raidensciencefoundation.description_text:
Payments to the Raiden Science Foundation are made via the PayPal Giving Fund.

The Raiden Science Foundation unites the community to drive the advancement of cures for rare diseases that impact children, starting with UBA5 disorder. We are overcoming research barriers in the world of RARE to deliver life-changing therapies. Our aim is to create more than just hope.

lego_batman2.callout: The 2nd Lego Batman game, marks the first time in a LEGO game that characters have voices. You can play as Batman, Robin, and other DC heroes like Superman, Wonder Woman, and Green Lantern and battle Lex Luthor and The Joker.
lego_batman2.description_text:
Legends Unite! The Dynamic Duo of Batman and Robin join other famous super heroes from the DC Universe including Superman, Wonder Woman and Green Lantern to save Gotham City from destruction at the hands of the notorious villains Lex Luthor and the Joker.

Key Features
  • Collect 50 DC Comics characters and flex your new super abilities--soar through the air with free-roaming flight, freeze and push objects with Super-Breath, and heat up and cut holes through objects with Heat Vision.
  • Master new suits and gadgets such as Batman’s Power Suit and Robin’s Hazard Suit equipped with a Pressure Cannon that can absorb and dispense hazardous liquids.
  • Players can also explore Gotham City by walking, flying or unlocking and controlling a variety of cool vehicles including the Batmobile, Batwing and Batboat.
  • For the first time in a LEGO video game, hear the LEGO characters talk!
  • Enjoy the game with friends and family using easy drop-in/drop-out co-op play that features dynamic split screen.

lego_legomovie.callout: Based on the Lego Movie, this game has you play as Emmet and a cast of colorful characters as they try to stop Lord Business from gluing the world together. The game features a new "Master Builder" ability that allows you to build anything you can imagine.
lego_legomovie.description_text:
<html>
 <head>
 </head>
 <body>
  Join Emmet and an unlikely group of resistance fighters in their heroic quest to thwart Lord Business’ evil plans—a mission that Emmet is hopelessly and hilariously unprepared for.  It’s a wild ride with a surprising mix of over 90 playable characters including Batman, Superman, Wonder Woman, the Green Ninja, Gandalf, Shakespeare, Cleopatra and more.
 </body>
</html>

lego_jurassicworld.callout: All four Jurassic Park films in the LEGO style. You can play as characters from the films and explore Isla Nublar and Isla Sorna. You can also create and customize your own dinosaurs.
lego_jurassicworld.description_text:
Following the epic storylines of Jurassic Park, The Lost World: Jurassic Park and Jurassic Park III, as well as the highly anticipated Jurassic World, LEGO Jurassic World™ is the first videogame where players will be able to relive and experience all four Jurassic films. Reimagined in LEGO form and told in TT Games’ signature classic LEGO humor, the thrilling adventure recreates unforgettable scenes and action sequences from the films, allowing fans to play through key moments and giving them the opportunity to fully explore the expansive grounds of Isla Nublar and Isla Sorna.

GAME FEATURES:
• Relive key moments from all four Jurassic films: An adventure 65 million years in the making - now in classic LEGO brick fun!
• Wreak havoc as LEGO dinosaurs: Choose from 20 dinosaurs, including the friendly Triceratops, deadly Raptor, vicious Compy and even the mighty T. rex.
• Customize your own dinosaur collection: Collect LEGO amber and experiment with DNA to create completely original dinosaurs, like the Dilophosaurus Rex.
• Populate and explore Isla Nublar and Isla Sorna: Put your unique dinosaur creations in to paddocks as you complete special Free Play missions.
• Play with family and friends with easy access drop-in, drop-out gameplay option.

legomarvelavengers.callout: Experience the stories of The Avengers and Avengers: Age of Ultron. You can play as over 200 characters from the Marvel Universe. The Deluxe Edition includes the Season Pass, which adds new character packs and levels.
legomarvelavengers.description_text: Avengers Assemble! The best-selling LEGO® MARVEL videogame franchise returns with a new action-packed, Super Hero adventure. Join the LEGO® MARVEL's Avengers team and experience a videogame featuring characters and storylines from the critically-acclaimed films and more. Play as the most powerful Super Heroes in their quest to save the world.

raidensciencefoundation.description_text:
Payments to the Raiden Science Foundation are made via the PayPal Giving Fund.

The Raiden Science Foundation unites the community to drive the advancement of cures for rare diseases that impact children, starting with UBA5 disorder. We are overcoming research barriers in the world of RARE to deliver life-changing therapies. Our aim is to create more than just hope.

from_bundle.tile_short_name: LEGO Worlds Collide 2025
from_bundle.short_marketing_blurb: A LEGO world for every interest
from_bundle.marketing_blurb: Get LEGO® The Hobbit™, LEGO® Jurassic World, LEGO® DC Super-Villains (DELUXE EDITION), LEGO® Star Wars™: The Skywalker Saga (Deluxe), LEGO® Marvel Super Heroes 2 (DELUXE EDITION), and more!
from_bundle.detailed_marketing_blurb:
We’re stacking up great games brick-by-brick with the all-new LEGO Worlds Collide Bundle! This gigantic bundle from Warner Bros. mixes your favorite franchises with the unmistakable LEGO charm to create unique gaming experiences that puts you in the shoes of your favorite characters. Play LEGO® Star Wars™: The Skywalker Saga, LEGO® Marvel Super Heroes 2 Deluxe Edition, LEGO® Batman™ 3: Beyond Gotham Premium Edition, and become the LEGO hero of legend! Pay what you want for the ultimate LEGO bundle, and help support Raiden Science Foundation with your purchase!

Keys expire. Please redeem your key before March 24th. 2026.
from_bundle.author: WB Games

basic_data.human_name: Indie Likes and Lites
basic_data.detailed_marketing_blurb: We’ve curated our hottest bundle of the summer with the coolest indie games around. Explore the action-packed puzzler from the hero that helped establish a genre with Shovel Knight Pocket Dungeon, try the addictive roguelite puzzle mashup Let's! Revolution!, or enjoy a satirical dungeon-crawler based on the monotony of modern life in Going Under, and much more. Fall in love with an unexpected indie game and help support World Central Kitchen with your purchase.
basic_data.description:
The biggest little indie games. We’ve curated our hottest bundle of the summer with the coolest indie games around. Explore the action-packed puzzler from the hero that helped establish a genre with Shovel Knight Pocket Dungeon, try the addictive roguelite puzzle mashup Let's! Revolution!, or enjoy a satirical dungeon-crawler based on the monotony of modern life in Going Under, and much more. Fall in love with an unexpected indie game and help support World Central Kitchen with your purchase.

Pay $5 or more. Normally, the total cost for the games in this bundle is as much as $130. Here at Humble Bundle, you choose the price and increase your contribution to upgrade your bundle! This bundle has a minimum $5 purchase. Pay $5 or more to access Steam keys.

Redeem on Steam. All of the games in this bundle are available on Steam for Windows — and some for Mac and Linux too. Please review the system requirements here prior to purchasing.

Support charity. Choose where the money goes - between the developers and to support World Central Kitchen. If you like what we do, you can leave us a Humble Tip too!

rogueheroes_ruinsoftasos.callout:
78% Positive on Steam

A classic top-down action-adventure roguelite, with a focus on co-op gameplay. You and up to three friends explore procedurally generated dungeons, solve puzzles, and rebuild your village. Upgrade your character and the town, making future runs easier.
rogueheroes_ruinsoftasos.description_text:
A dark evil stirs beneath the once peaceful land of Tasos… Deep within the four Great Dungeons, the ancient seals that hold the Titans at bay are gravely weakened and their minions have unleashed terror upon the world.

The Goddesses who forged the seals long ago have made a desperate plea for a band of heroes to come forth and save the people from a terrible fate…

You are one of the heroes tasked with saving the realm of Tasos from the terrifying Titans. Whether you choose to take on your mission solo, or with up to three friends is your decision to make. Do you have what it takes to save Tasos?

Key Features:

4-Play Rogue-lite Adventure: Play solo or in co-op with up to 4 players to take down the Titans! Remember that death is not the end; rise again, upgrade your hero and venture out once more, stronger than before!

Tackle Procedural Dungeons: With its procedural engine, no two runs are the same! Each room has hand designed layouts, traps, puzzles and enemies all with randomised configurations, making every run feel fresh and different.

Classic Weapons: Rogue Heroes features classic top-down swordplay with a large range of tools, spells, and weapons to use as you explore Tasos and tackle the Great Dungeons. Locate classic weapons like a Bow, Boomerang and Grappling Hook to use at your disposal.

Rebuild your Town for Upgrades: Spend your hard-earned loot on new buildings for your village of Intori. From Weapons Smiths to fisheries, each can add new ways of adding to your abilities and arm you with the tools to return to the fight.

Multiple Classes: Each with their own unique abilities, find which character suits your style of play and take back Tasos!

goingunder.callout:
94% Positive on Steam

A satirical roguelike dungeon crawler where you play as an unpaid intern for a failed tech startup. You'll wield office junk as weapons and fight through the cursed ruins of businesses themed around gig workers and cryptocurrency. As you clear out the dungeons, you'll uncover the sinister truth behind your company's parent corporation.
goingunder.description_text:
Going Under is a satirical dungeon crawler about exploring the cursed ruins of failed tech startups. As an unpaid intern in the dystopian city of Neo-Cascadia, you’ll wield office junk as weaponry as you make your way through the offbeat procedural dungeons beneath your company campus.

The Future is Wack

Failed businesses no longer just cease to exist--they sink beneath the earth, and their employees are cursed to wander the halls for eternity as monsters. It’s your duty to put these monsters out of their misery and repossess their assets--so that your boss can afford a new car, or something.

Not All Heroes Get Paychecks

Battle through the remains of failed startups themed off of gig workers, dating sites, and cryptocurrency. Uncover the true motives of your employer, a carbonated drink startup known as Fizzle, and their parent company, a subscription box manufacturer with an army of helpful shipping drones. Make friends with your co-workers! Hire a freelance goblin! Date a slime! Invest in crypto! Set a rideshare on fire!

Fight Flexibly

In the dungeons of Going Under, almost everything can be used as a weapon, from laptops to brooms to body pillows. Proper weapons can be found as well, but even they can break at a moment’s notice if you aren’t careful. Playing cautiously and picking the right weapon for the situation are musts if you intend on surviving your internship.

Horrible Bosses

And you thought your boss was a monster. At the bottom of the dungeons lurk the founders of the cursed startups, getting rich off of investments while their employees fight amongst themselves. Defeat them and return to the surface with their enchanted relics to empower the company you work for.

Get Paid in Experience

As you explore, you’ll encounter powerful Skills that change the way you play. Learn them at the Cafe and they’ll show up in future runs. Use a Skill often enough, and you’ll get it “endorsed” and available to start your expeditions with. Combine multiple Skills for crazy synergies, and you’ll be cleaning house in no time.

A World of Characters

Complete Tasks for your co-workers to gain Clout with them and unlock their unique bonuses. Learn more about Neo-Cascadia, the origins of Fizzle, and how the drone shipping empire known as Cubicle came to dominate the city. Can you save your company and yourself from going under for good?

theouroborosking.callout:
83% Positive on Steam

A roguelike game that puts a clever twist on chess. You build and upgrade an army of chess pieces with special abilities and "relics," battling through procedurally generated maps. You'll need to master the tactical depth of chess while adapting to the wild new powers and random challenges that arise with each run.
theouroborosking.description_text:
Chess Meets Roguelike

The Ouroboros King combines the strategic depth of chess with the build variety and replayability of roguelikes. Assemble a formidable army, discover powerful relics, and buy surprising gadgets to defeat the Coven.


Conquer with Strategy

  • Build the Ultimate Army: Combine classic and new fairy chess pieces, relics that give them bonuses, and consumable items that grant you temporary advantages to create a formidable army.
  • Perfect Your Strategy: You can only move one piece per turn, so you must choose carefully. Make your troops work together to obliterate the enemy army.
  • Another Chance: If you're defeated you can go back to action on another timeline, where the path to victory will change: different map, different enemies, different rewards... in true roguelike spirit.


Key Features

  • Lots of end-game options to dial up the difficulty to insane levels.
  • Same-device multiplayer, challenge your friends to chess games with lots of unique pieces.
  • Chess-based tactics, easy to learn and hard to master.
  • 15-45 minute runs, good for a short break and also longer sessions.
  • No gatekeeping, all the content is unlocked from the start. Win or die based on your skills.
  • No need to learn any chess openings or study anything.
  • All in game text is available in English

Game inspirations: Shotgun King: Chess, The Final Checkmate, Pawnbarian, Slay the Spire, Into the Breach, 5D chess with multiverse timetravel.

Illustrations by Isaac Murgadella

meteorfall_krumitstale.callout:
93% Positive on Steam

A single-player deckbuilding roguelike and spin-off of Meteorfall: Journeys. You battle monsters on a grid-based board, using cards to attack, gain items, and cast spells. Unlike traditional card games, you have to carefully manage the board's state and choose your actions wisely, making each run a new tactical puzzle.
meteorfall_krumitstale.description_text:
Battle the likes of sozzled bearbearians and nuke-addled snotwolves to protect our glowing green world from the sweaty hands of the Uberlich! Krumit's Tale involves the same core deck building mechanics as Meteorfall: Journeys and the same cast of overly optimistic heroes, but expands the ‘swipe’ mechanic into a dynamic grid based system. This means more depth and longevity – our heroes will have to choose perks to complement their deck-building strategy and carefully manage the board if they wish to triumph.

Features

Unique roguelike gameplay
Your hero starts out with a deck of basic cards (items & abilities). At the start of each dungeon, your hero's deck is shuffled into the dungeon deck (monsters) and dealt out in a 3x3 grid. Defeat monsters to earn gold, then use that gold to acquire your items & abilities from the dungeon. Remove a tile from the dungeon and a new one will be dealt out from the dungeon deck. After you clear a dungeon, you'll earn new, powerful cards to add to your deck as well as perks - passive traits that bend the rules of the game.

Colorful characters
The exciting and colorful cast of Meteorfall: Journeys (iOS & Android) returns in Krumit's Tale. Join your favorite heroes: Bruno, Greybeard, Mischief, Rose and Muldorf as they attempt to defeat the Uberlich in this exciting new adventure. You'll also meet Krumit, a mysterious shop owner who trades in magical artifacts. Why has he summoned you to his shop, and what secrets does he hold?

Unlockable heroes and cards
When you first visit Krumit, you'll only be able to select Bruno. After each run, you'll earn XP and automatically unlock new characters and cards. Krumit's Tale respects your time - you'll be able to unlock all of the content easily through normal gameplay, and never have to grind.

.. and a whole lot more
  • Five heroes, each with their own unique playstyle
  • 50+ perks - passive abilities that change the rules of the game
  • 50+ unique cards per hero, plus a neutral pool of shared cards
  • Ideal for short bursts of play - runs take about 45-60 minutes and autosave allows you to quit at any time and continue later
  • 20+ enemies, each beautifully animated by the talented Evgeny Viitman (artist for Meteorfall: Journeys)
  • Innovative grid-based system gives players opportunity to construct awesome combos and plan ahead
  • Procedurally generated journey - each run, the dungeons you'll encounter vary
  • A whimsical but deeply thought out world, humorous script and diverse cast of characters and NPC's – the Meteorfall Universe grows!
  • Gameplay by Eric Farraro, the designer behind Meteorfall: Journeys
  • Evgeny Viitman’s iconic art and animations
  • Craig Barnes’ compelling musical compositions
  • Intricate tales and item flavor penned by Danny Wadeson
  • Krumit's professionally voice acted by Adrian Vaughan

croprotation.callout:
94% Positive on Steam

A minimalistic roguelike deckbuilding game with a farming theme. You draft cards to build a deck that automatically plays out, allowing you to focus on creating powerful synergies and managing your farm. Find the right card combinations to maximize your harvest!
croprotation.description_text:
You have taken a loan to buy an automated farm. The loan is huge but the farm should pay for itself right ??? RIGHT ???

Crop Rotation is a farming-theme card drafting game. Cards are played automatically so you can focus on the deck building and building synergies.

Earn enough money to pay off the loan, or spend all of them rerolling for that one card

Challenge yourself by climbing the rating mode.

rackandslay.callout:
91% Positive on Steam

A physics-based roguelite dungeon crawler that uses billiards mechanics for its combat. You play as a billiard ball and must "pocket" monster balls on a table-like arena. Each shot is a strategic puzzle, and you'll collect power-ups, navigate traps, and use the environment to defeat enemies and progress through the levels.
rackandslay.description_text:
THE BILLIARDS ROGUELIKE

A pure-fun roguelike dungeon crawler where you're a billiard ball making your way through randomly generated levels full of monster balls, traps, collectible power-ups and more!

DRAFT YOUR BUILD

Between levels, draft from a wide variety of 100+ items with game-changing effects (all of which are stackable) to find combos, build synergies and refine your playstyle!

ASCEND THE LADDER

Battle through 20 levels of difficulty, each one adding more challenging modifiers!

VALUE YOUR TIME

While you unlock additional items by playing for even greater variety, there's NO meta treadmill "+1% power" grind!

PLAY YOUR WAY

Play a full 10-level dungeon crawl in 20-30 minutes, or choose the condensed Delve Mode with half the levels but extra loot, or tackle a single-level raid with random items.

TRACK YOUR PROGRESS

Wins are not just tracked per difficulty and mode, but you also receive difficulty-specific badges for each item you win a run with. Fill your item compendium and collect them all!

SUPPORT AN INDIE TEAM OF 2

Design & Code: Fabian Fischer (@Ludokultur)
Art & Animations: Victor Negreiro (@estivador)

FEATURES (if you're into lists)

  • UNIQUE GAMEPLAY: Face physics-based billiards combat challenges tied together by a rogue-like run structure in a dungeon setting!
  • LONG-TERM REPLAYABILITY: Procedural dungeon layouts filled with randomized monsters, obstacles and power-ups combine with a large variety of 100+ items to draft from to ensure no two runs play the same!
  • RELENTLESS CHALLENGE: Climb through 20 difficulty levels, each one modifying the game to become more challenging!
  • GAME MODES: Play a full dungeon crawl in 20-30 minutes, or condense your run to half the length with extra loot, or tackle a single-level raid for just a few minutes!
  • ENDLESS MODE: Continue after winning a run to see how broken your build can get!
  • DAILY RUNS: Face a new gauntlet featuring a unique combination of run modifiers every single day!
  • SIMPLE CONTROLS: Pick-up-and-play controls make sure you’ll aim and shoot (via mouse or controller) within seconds!

letsrevolution.callout:
96% Positive on Steam

A unique roguelite puzzle mashup that combines the logic of Minesweeper with turn-based tactical combat. You navigate a grid of hidden tiles, using logic to avoid enemies and find loot, all while chasing a "rotten King." The game features different classes with unique abilities, and each run is a new, procedurally generated challenge.
letsrevolution.description_text:
Rise up in Let’s! Revolution! , a roguelite puzzle mashup that builds on the classic rules of Minesweeper with procedurally generated mazes and turn-based tactics.

Embark on a deadly game of hide and seek, chasing the rotten King across the enchanting land of Beebom.

Put your problem-solving skills to the test as you flip tiles to outsmart deadly foes and uncover powerful items and abilities.

Evade the King’s deadly boot-licking lackeys or take them down in strategic turn-based combat.

Gear up along the way with over 100 items and abilities for a final showdown with the King himself in Beebom City.

Dive into the beautifully illustrated and hand-animated world of Beebom in this debut game from award-winning animation house BUCK . The original score and sound design by Antfood brings Beebom to life as a vibrant sonic world.

THE HEROES

Choose your hero from six unique classes, each with their own playstyle and abilities, including:

  • The Charger , a powerhouse who unleashes devastating attacks but must keep charging into hidden tiles to gain energy.
  • The Shadow , who uses cunning items like Smoke Bombs and Sleep Darts to outwit and outmaneuver enemies.
